features: Downy Rinse and Refresh helps removes odors up to 3 times better than detergent alone, so fabrics look and smell clean. removes odors in 1 wash better than the leading value detergent in 3 washes. Downy Rinse Study FAB-21460
DEEP CLEANSING FABRIC RINSE: Downy Rinse and Refresh replaces your liquid fabric softener and acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove stubborn odors and residues deep within fabrics
REMOVES STUBBORN ODORS and RESIDUES: The breakthrough laundry odor remover rinses away residues and odors better than detergent alone
EASY TO USE: Just pour Downy Rinse and Refresh in your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly in the rinse cycle

SOFTER, BRIGHTER FABRICS: Unlike traditional liquid fabric softener that can deposit residues on clothes, Downy Rinse and Refresh rinses away residues for fresher, softer and brighter fabrics vs detergent alone.
COOL COTTON SCENT: Downy Rinse and Refresh fights stinky odors, but keeps your fabrics soft and smelling fresh with the light, breezy scent of Cool Cotton
body.description: Tired of stubborn odors that never seem to wash out of your clothes? Introducing Downy Rinse & Refresh, a breakthrough laundry odor remover that helps rinse away the smelly residue trapped within fabric fibers. While traditional liquid fabric softener can deposit residues on fabrics trapping odors in, Downy Rinse & Refresh acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove residues and odors. This leaves fabrics fresher, softer, and brighter than before. No more reappearing odors. Downy Rinse & Refresh, leaves behind the light, refreshing scent of Cool Cotton. Smelly activewear, musty towels, even forgotten laundry in your washing machine overnight… Downy Rinse & Refresh detergent booster strips odors away without the use of vinegar or other homemade laundry hacks. And because it’s free of dyes and heavy perfumes, this odor remover is gentle on sensitive skin and perfect for baby clothes, too. Plus, it’s easy to use! Just pour it into your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly into the rinse cycle. Want to add additional fresh scent? Add Downy Scent Booster Beads to your routine for extra freshness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ready to remove odors from stinky activewear, musty towels and more? Just start a load of laundry like you normally would with your preferred laundry detergent. Just pour Downy Rinse & Refresh into your washer's fabric softener dispenser. It works in the rinse cycle to remove residues and odors trapped in fabric fibers. No more reemerging odors! Fabrics come out fresher, softer and brighter because Downy Rinse & Refresh removes all the gunk and funk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's the perfect addition to your laundry routine!
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Eliminates tough odors: This product does wonders in removing stubborn odors from your clothes, leaving them smelling fresh and clean.Softens fabrics: Not only does it eliminate odors, but it also leaves your clothes feeling soft and comfortable to wear. It's gentle on all fabrics and even safe for sensitive skin.Easy to use: Simply add it to your washing machine during the rinse cycle and let it work its magic. It's compatible with HE machines, making it a great option for all households.Cool Cotton scent: The Cool Cotton scent is refreshing and subtle, adding an extra touch of freshness to your laundry.Cons:May not work on all odors: While this product is great at removing most odors, it may not be effective on all types of smells.Requires additional step: Adding the product during the rinse cycle requires an extra step in your laundry routine, which may not be convenient for everyone.Bottle size: The 48 fl oz bottle may not last very long for larger households or those who do laundry frequently.In summary, the Downy Rinse & Refresh Laundry Odor Remover and Fabric Softener is a great option for anyone looking to eliminate tough odors and add extra softness to their laundry. It's easy to use and has a refreshing scent. Just be aware of its limitations and the need for an extra step in your laundry routine. Try it out and see the difference it can make for your clothes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a game changer!
reviews.reviewText: Since I started using this stuff I no longer use the beads. I feel like it leaves a nice long lasting delightful scent on my clothes. It also leaves them feeling soft and clean. I recommend this over beads and fabric softeners. I know I won't be buying those products anymore! It even works well with cheaper laundry detergents when I'm I a pinch for cash and can't get what I prefer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goodbye Sniffles, Hello Freshness! Downy RINSE & REFRESH Steals the Show!
reviews.reviewText: Tired of laundry day leaving your clothes clean but a little...meh? Downy RINSE & REFRESH Cool Cotton changed the game for me! Here's why it's become my laundry room BFF:Odor Obliterator: Say goodbye to that lingering "musty towel" or "gym funk" smell. This stuff tackles hidden odor residues like a ninja, leaving your clothes smelling fresh and airy, like they were line-dried on a breezy spring day. No more sniffing suspicions!Softer than a Kitten's Purr: Forget stiff, scratchy fabrics. Downy RINSE & REFRESH makes your clothes luxuriously soft and smooth, even towels and denim! It's like adding a spa visit to your laundry routine.Color & Care Champion: No worries about fading or shrinking. This formula is gentle on all fabrics, even delicates, protecting your colors without sacrificing that fresh scent. My favorite sweater still looks brand new!Cool Cotton Bliss: The Cool Cotton scent is light and refreshing, not overpowering or perfume-y. It's like a clean cotton sheet on a warm summer night – pure comfort in a bottle.The Verdict: 5 out of 5 sparkling stars! Downy RINSE & REFRESH has won a permanent spot in my laundry arsenal. It's the ultimate combo of odor removal, fabric softening, and gentle care, all with a delightful scent. Worth every penny for laundry that feels and smells amazing!P.S. Bonus points for the easy-to-use bottle and eco-friendly packaging. Downy gets it right on all fronts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great to remove smells from laundry and leaves clothes smelling fresh and soft, without the use of fabric softener. I love the scent as it is very light and not overpowering.The value, however, isn’t really there. Without a coupon you’re paying $13, which is fairly pricy for what it does. You could put 1/2 cup vinegar in the fabric softener tray and it does the same thing, just without the scent.Also, the cap is a bit annoying to use and seems like an afterthought. In the pictures on the label it shows a pouring spout, but the bottle is like a gatorade sized hole. Not the easiest to pour when it’s full.Overall though the product works well, even if it is a bit pricey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricy but worth it
reviews.reviewText: This product is quite pricy but so worth it! It makes my clothes feel softer and better than a regular softener does. Also my clothes come out smelling so fresh, no scent boosters needed anymore. I’m guess that basically evens out the pricing with buying softener and scent booster. This is basically that combined into one!
